code: import React,{useEffect,useState}from'react';import{useParams}from"react-router-dom";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getPost}from'../../redux/actions/postAction';import LoadIcon from'../../images/loading.gif';import PostCard from"../../components/PostCard";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Post=()=>{const{id}=useParams();const[post,setPost]=useState([]);const{auth,detailPost}=useSelector(state=>state);const dispatch=useDispatch();useEffect(()=>{dispatch(getPost({detailPost,id,auth}));if(detailPost.length>0){const newArr=detailPost.filter(post=>post._id===id);setPost(newArr);}},[detailPost,dispatch,id,auth]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"posts",children:[post.length===0&&/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:LoadIcon,alt:"Loading...",className:"d-block mx-auto my-4"}),post.map(item=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(PostCard,{post:item},item._id))]});};export default Post;
